text: Garth Marenghi's Darkplace is a British horror parody television series. It was created for Channel 4 by Richard Ayoade and Matthew Holness. It first broadcast in 1998. The show focuses on fictional horror author Garth Marenghi (played by Matthew Holness) and his publisher Dean Learner (played by Richard Ayoade), characters who originated in the Garth Marenghi's Fright Knight stage show. == Episodes == This list is ordered by the original air dates on Channel 4 in the United Kingdom. Category:British television series Category:British comedy television series Category:1998 television series debuts Category:1990s British comedy television series
title: Garth Marenghi's Darkplace
